body:
Comment 4 by **aidanphs**: 
I don't know, I only started learning go 2 days ago...
I guess panic during panic is to do with 'panic'ing in a defer without recovering first?

But outside of tests libpq only ever has one defer (errRecover), the first line of which
is to recover. So tentatively a gccgo problem? Still working on reducing the program.
